name: Yrrdrynil (Prototype)
description:
PROTOTYPE

Use the magical roots of the great forest Yrrdrynil to battle fearsome foes, and ultimately reclaim your title... would be a great pitch for a full version but you kinda just teleport and fight guys. It's a prototype.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Attack - Left Mouse

Teleport (Context Sensitive) - Space 

Programming and Character/VFX Art - Arthur Gan 

Level Design and Environment Art - Lucas Immanuel

For the Davis GGJ outlet
